page.title: 15 MY PART OF NORTHAMPTON
page.content: I live down Bridgewater Drive which is a very pleasant area near to Abington Park and Weston Favell. The park is very large; it has three lakes, playing fields, a play area with slides, swings, and climbing frames. There is also a museum which contains a special exhibition of things associated with the Northamptonshire Regiment as well as collections of old toys, lace and horse-drawn carriages. Down Churchway near where I live there is an old church called St.Peters. I live in the parish of St. Gregory's and go to St.Mary's Middle School for children aged nine to thirteen years. Caroline Stratten.
